alert.note: Alert for Lucas; Ottawa; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 5:52PM EDT until July 20 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ottawa County in northwestern Ohio... Northern Wood County in northwestern Ohio... Southern Lucas County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 551 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Holland to near Wauseon, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Toledo, Bowling Green, Swanton, Perrysburg, Oregon, Rossford, Waterville, Northwood, Whitehouse, Genoa, Holland, Maumee, Walbridge, Pemberville, Millbury, Haskins, Luckey, Grand Rapids, Tontogany and Clay Center. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
